name: universal-translator-pro
description: Universal Translator Pro for Rocket.Chat - Seamless multilingual communication

scripts.dev: npm run dev:plugin & npm run dev:api
scripts.dev:plugin: echo '⚠️  Plugin dev mode requires secure environment. Build with: npm run build:plugin:secure'
scripts.build: npm run build:plugin:secure && npm run build:api
scripts.test: npm run test:plugin && npm run test:api
scripts.perf:quick: cd performance && BASE_URL=http://192.168.110.199:3012 TARGET_USERS=25 TEST_DURATION=2m k6 run enhanced-api-load-test.js
scripts.perf:stress: cd performance && BASE_URL=http://192.168.110.199:3012 TARGET_USERS=500 k6 run enhanced-api-load-test.js
scripts.perf:cache: cd performance && BASE_URL=http://192.168.110.199:3012 k6 run cache-effectiveness-test.js
scripts.perf:concurrent: cd performance && BASE_URL=http://192.168.110.199:3012 CONCURRENT_USERS=1000 k6 run concurrent-users-test.js
scripts.perf:resources: cd performance && BASE_URL=http://192.168.110.199:3012 k6 run resource-monitoring-test.js
scripts.perf:baseline: cd performance && BASE_URL=http://192.168.110.199:3012 TARGET_USERS=10 k6 run enhanced-api-load-test.js
scripts.perf:report: cd performance && echo 'Performance reports available in ./performance-reports/'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:plugin && npm run lint:api
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:plugin -- --fix && npm run lint:api -- --fix
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:plugin && npm run typecheck:api
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd plugin && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level=high && cd api && npm audit --audit-level=high && cd ../plugin && npm audit --audit-level=high

author: Kostas Noreika

security.note: Docker isolation implemented for @rocket.chat/apps-cli to eliminate lodash.template vulnerabilities
security.buildProcess: Plugin builds use isolated Docker container with vulnerable dependencies
security.mitigation: Production environment has zero exposure to lodash.template vulnerabilities
